name: Carris
description:
You play as Carris, a young bunny who sets out completely of their own free will to stop the Evil Malicious Mutated Bunny that's wreaking havoc on all of Bunny society. And this vile creature has been aptly named...

Timothy The Merciful. (Eugh...)

Please Carris, put an end to Timothy The Merciful's reign of terror! All of Bunny society is counting on you!

(Sorry for any crackling, I don't know how to fix it)

Controls:

ARROW_KEYS = MOVE

Z = ATTACK

X = DODGE

SPACE = SELECT/POTION (Only 2 Potions)

For VimJam2

Requirement: Boss

There is Bunny Boss. The boss only moves. Couldn't program anything else as I was getting really stressed at the thought of even attempting to. I can't be a lone programmer apparently

Theme: On the Edge

I went with On the Edge of Death. The less health you have, the more damage you do.

There's also On the Edge of Extinction because story reasons (And you might say that the story you put in in the description doesn't count, but there's something in the game that alludes to the story if you die so HAH! It's there by technicality)
